Upcoming Events
What‚Äôs On ‚Äì Gold Coast
Exciting Gold Coast events are just around the corner, and there‚Äôs no better place to stay than Nobby Beach Holiday Village!
Located in the heart of the action, our accommodation provides the perfect home base for enjoying all the upcoming local Gold Coast events. Whether it‚Äôs music festivals, sporting competitions, or cultural celebrations, you‚Äôll be just minutes away from the vibrant atmosphere. With comfortable and well-equipped lodgings, friendly staff, and excellent amenities, make your booking at Nobby Beach Holiday Village today and experience the best of the Gold Coast events scene.
Weekly Events & Markets
We are incredibly fortunate to have a bustling array of local entertainment options that take place every week. Explore our curated list of top picks featuring the latest and greatest events in the area:
Live Music & Night Food Markets
at Miami Marketta ‚Äì Wed, Thurs, Fri & Sat from 5pm

How To Get Here
We look forward to welcoming you...
Our entrance has changed
All guests are to use our entrance at
2200 Gold Coast Highway, Miami, QLD 4220
.
Once checked in, use the gate at
1 Hillcrest Parade, Miami
, for exiting and re-entry.
IMPORTANT: Some GPS apps are
still playing tricks on us and sending guests to our old entrance instead of our shiny new home (see image below). If your map tries to sneak you up the hill or to Hillcrest Parade, please ignore it and cruise down to the Gold Coast Highway. You‚Äôll find us right there with a big Nobby Beach Holiday Village welcome!
Arriving By Car
Southbound on the Gold Coast Highway:
Head south on the Gold Coast Highway. As you approach Mermaid Beach, move into the right lane and turn right on Markeri Street (opposite Mermaid Plaza).¬† Take the first right onto Sunshine Blvd/Pacific Ave, follow the road until the end and turn left onto the Gold Coast Highway. The park entrance is on the left after Kedron Ave.
Northbound on the Gold Coast Highway from Gold Coast Airport:
Follow Terminal Drive to the Gold Coast Highway. Turn left onto the Gold Coast Highway and travel north for 15km until you reach Miami. Turn left at 2200 Gold Coast Highway, Miami (after Kedron Ave).
Driving from Coolangatta 15 kilometres (approx. 20 minutes).
Southbound on the M1 from Brisbane:
Take Exit 85, for Varsity Lakes and continue along Reedy Creek Rd until you reach the Gold Coast Highway, turn left and travel north to Miami. Turn left at 2200 Gold Coast Highway, Miami (after Kedron Ave).
Driving from Brisbane: 85 kilometres (approx. 1 hour)
Northbound on the M1 from New South Wales:
Take Exit 87 and continue along Bermuda St until you turn right at Reedy Creek Road. Continue on Reedy Creek Road until you reach the Gold Coast Highway, turn left and travel north to Miami. Turn left at 2200 Gold Coast Highway, Miami (after Kedron Ave) for check-in.
Driving from Sydney: 840 kilometres (approx 9 hours)
Arriving By Public Transport
Use the
Translink Journey Planner
to find the best public transport options, including times and fares.
If using local buses:
Look for Surfside Bus 700 or 777
Get off at Nobby Beach Shops
Walk south 190m along the Gold Coast Highway. Our entrance is located on the right.
This bus runs with regular stops from Wharf St, Tweed Heads to Broadbeach South Station.
Total walking distance from the bus stop = 190m
VISIT TRANSLINK WEBSITE
Arriving By Light Rail

Dining Nearby
ÓÄó
Markets
People First Stadium ‚Äì AFL Suns
People First Stadium (formerly Metricon / Heritage Bank Stadium) in Carrara is located 15 minutes from Nobby Beach Holiday Village. The Carrara based Stadium is the largest multipurpose facility that seats 25,000 spectators and is home to the AFL Gold Coast SUNS. It features an AFL oval that is capable of holding ICC cricket matches, concerts, festivals, IAAF athletics events and FIFA World Cup soccer matches.
Event Shuttles:
Patrons in possession of a valid match day entry pass on event days can board one of the free event shuttle buses to and from the Stadium on scheduled Surfside Buses, Queensland Rail and G:link services. Simply show your valid entry card.
Driving to People First Stadium:
Take advantage of the Boowaggan Rd Park ‚ÄòN‚Äô Ride (Cnr of Boowaggan Road and Robina Parkway, Merrimac). This free car park opens approximately 2.5 hours prior to the start of AFL matches and will close approximately 1 hour post match. Park your car then jump on the free return shuttle bus to People First Stadium.
WHERE:
Nerang Broadbeach Rd, Carrara
BACK TO TOURS & ATTRACTIONS
VISIT WEBSITE

Our family of 4 stayed in a Basic Studio Apartment with shared bathroom over the Australia Day long weekend and it was so nice. The unit has all you need for a short stay and had aircon and the camp kitchen is just across from the units with BBQ's and more seating. Bathrooms are also just opposite the units and was neat and clean. The pool and waterslide is great and my bigger kids loved the monkey bar playground. The location is great, lots of restaurants close by and beach also close, we walked to Miami Marketta on Saturday night and had such a great time there. The staff at check-in was so nice and helpful with loads of tips to do in the area plus they had a great selection of entertainment happening for the kids. We'll definitely be back!
